Raissa Estrela Curado

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0001073080069679
  • Última atualização do currículo em 25/02/2016

Raissa is currently a Ph.D. candidate at the University of California, Berkeley. She earned a Master's degree in Genetics and Molecular Biology from the State University of Campinas (UNICAMP) and a Bachelor's degree in Biological Sciences from the same university. Currently she is working on metabolic engineering of yeast for production of cellulosic ethanol. (Texto informado pelo autor)
